column3: was a Hobbit of the Shire.

column1: Bell married Gaffer Gamgee. She would eventually give birth to Hamson Gamgee
column5: the famed Samwise Gamgee and Marigold Gamgee.

column1: Bell is possibly named after bellflowers
column2: such as bluebell and harbell.Jim Allan (ed.)

column4: Hilda and a somewhat unwilling Bilbo Baggins. She hides on the top floor of the Old Mill
column5: which is only accessible by riding the water-wheel. Bell and Hamfast are shown to have a mutual love interest
column6: but neither of them told the other.The Hobbit (2003 video game)
